<script>
    $(document).ready(function () {
      //industry
      var industry_chosen=document.getElementById('industry_chosen');
      //console.log('toul',industry_chosen.childNodes.item(0).childNodes.length);
      if(industry_chosen.childNodes.item(0).childNodes.length==2){
          industry_chosen.parentNode.style.display="none";
        
      }
      //speciality_chosen
      var speciality_chosen=document.getElementById('speciality_chosen');
      console.log('toul',speciality_chosen.childNodes.item(0).childNodes.length);
      if(speciality_chosen.childNodes.item(0).childNodes.length==1){
          speciality_chosen.parentNode.style.display="none";
         
      }
      //location_chosen 
    
      var location_chosen=document.getElementById('location_chosen');
      if(location_chosen.childNodes.item(0).childNodes.length ==1){
         location_chosen.parentNode.style.display="none";
      }
     
      //keywords
        var keywords=document.getElementById('keywords');
      if(keywords.value==""){
         keywords.parentNode.style.display="none";
      }
      //slider  pointer-events:none;
        var slider=document.getElementById("slider_years_experience_years_experience");
        
       
    // slider hide
    var min=document.getElementById('min_num_of_emp').value;
    var max=document.getElementById('max_num_of_emp').value;
    console.log(min);
    console.log(max);
    if(min==0 && max==10001){
       console.log(slider.parentNode.parentNode.parentNode);
       slider.parentNode.parentNode.parentNode.style.display="none";
    }else{
        slider.parentNode.parentNode.parentNode.style.pointerEvents = "none"; 
    }
    //status change
     var active=document.getElementsByName('status')[0];
     var closed=document.getElementsByName('status')[1];
        
     
    
      active.addEventListener("click", function(){
          document.getElementById('submit').click();
          
      },false);
       closed.addEventListener("click", function(){
          document.getElementById('submit').click();
          
      },false);
      
      
    
      
      });
         
    
      
    
    </script>
    <style>
   
    .users-list li img {
  
    margin-bottom: 35px;
    }
    </style>
